dmca.title: [ABUSE] Client in server 67.19.238.78
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Monday, April 10, 2006 9:29 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Client in server 67.19.238.78]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Client in server 67.19.238.78
Date: Mon, 10 Apr 2006 09:46:27 -0400
From: GoClickZ <webmaster@goclickz.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Hi Theplanet,

This http://www.sobtsearch.com/  which is hosted in theplanet network is
stealing www.goclickz.com script and design content, we wrote email to site
owner but they didn't respond with proper action.

Could you please look into it and let us know what information we need to
send in order to prove this design which he is copied from www.goclickz.com
belongs to goclickz.com , we tried to reach their hosting but can't because
of his listed nameservers are dns1.name-services.com dns2.name-services.com
dns3.name-services.com dns4.name-services.com dns5.name-services.com

These people do not even provide their proper information in their domain
registrar also, so its very difficult to reach to them.

Please help us to take necessary action against these people, such activity
harming our business.

We hope for a quick response.

thanks

Bhagwati Pandey
Administrator Goclickz.com
603-888-0958



-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEOmuOvK/XpJs6oyURAo7qAKCfhpA8Q0mKpuclb5PfvbOqJnEW3QCfVG/q
Pnq9ur8D9tQXLn2Yt29R2Lc=
=AyDS
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
